44.title: Sikh Religion: Its Gurus, Sacred Writings and Authors, Volume 2
44.description: This is one of the first (and still one of the few) comprehensive books about the Sikh religion in the English language. MacAuliffe had extensive access to manuscripts of the Sikh sacred writings (the Granth), as well as support from Sikh scholars and leaders of the time. This volume covers Guru Angad, Guru Amar Das and Guru Ram Das.  This is volume two of six. - Summary by http://sacred-texts.com/skh/tsr1/index.htm
